sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row class="secondary">
    <v-col sm="12" md="12">
      <v-tabs
        v-model="tab"
        slider-size="10"
        center-active>
        <v-tabs-slider color="secondary"></v-tabs-slider>
        <v-tab
          v-for="plan in plans"
          :key="plan.id">
          {{ plan.name }}
        </v-tab>
      </v-tabs>
      <v-tabs-items v-model="tab">
        <v-tab-item
          v-for="plan in plans"
          :key="plan.id">
          <v-sheet outlined color="secondary">
            <v-card outlined tile flat>
              <v-card-text>{{ plan.description }}</v-card-text>
            </v-card>
          </v-sheet>
        </v-tab-item>
      </v-tabs-items>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'PlanTabList',
  props: {
    plans: Array,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      tab: null,
    }
  },
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
